page.title: 02LAND USE SURVEY
page.content: Problem to be solved: IN A COASTAL AREA WITH A HIGH POPULATION DENSITY IS IT TRUE TO SAY THERE IS A PATTERN OF LAND USE LIKE THE ONE SUGGESTED BELOW? Tourist functions along the coast,old terraced residential area behind, then the main street and then further inland,the main residential area(detached and semi-detached). Two or three people were allocated to each of the 12 land areas.As the amenities were surveyed their numerical value was entered on a 1:2500 map.We reached our areas in the school minibus.During lessons these values were totalled and transferred to a master map. Conclusion to Problem: There is no pattern like the one suggested above,in our area.It was mainly housing.
